job.title: Software Test Engineer
job.description: stronguDescriptionbrbrustrongOur client has an urgent need for a software test engineer to join their team right away This individual will be working in their consumer mobile application products group This individual will be developing test tools for the SW Testers to utilize They will be writing the automation code in Python and will be testing it and giving feedback to the team on how it performsbrulli Designs develops and implements test plans and test casesscripts for complete and complex frameworks systems and productslili Tests advanced software systems to ensure compliance with system specifications and system interoperabilitylili Identifies analyzes and resolves software issuesbrliulstronguMust HavesbrbrustrongstrongAdditional Skills amp Qualificationsbrstrongulli Bachelors degree in Computer Science Electrical Engineering or related disciplinelili Minimum of 2 years of experiencelili Uses skills as a seasoned experienced professional in systems testing of software productsliliMust have coding experience utilizing pythonbrliulstronguAbout ActalentbrbrustrongActalent connects passion with purpose Our scalable talent solutions and services capabilities drive value and results and provide the expertise to help our customers achieve more Every day our experts around the globe are making an impact Were supporting critical initiatives in engineering and sciences that advance how companies serve the world Actalent promotes consultant care and engagement through experiences that enable continuous development Our people are the difference Actalent is an operating company of Allegis Group the global leader in talent solutionsbrbrThe company is an equal opportunity employer and will consider all applications without regards to race sex age color religion national origin veteran status disability sexual orientation gender identity genetic information or any characteristic protected by lawbrbr
